heroes.name: Arcane Sapper
heroes.bio: Front line assassin, who is trained to hunt for Mages.

heroes.name: Bear Warrior
heroes.bio: Front line physical damage Tank, who can deal increased damage with each attack.

heroes.name: Cloud Walker
heroes.bio: Front line Agile Warrior, who can cause chaos and confusion by creating weaker clones of himself.

heroes.name: Depths Voice
heroes.bio: Front line physical damage dealer, who has area physical damage and area Control Skills.

heroes.name: Ember Blade
heroes.bio: Front line agile hero, who possess the mastery of ember blade to control and damage enemies.

heroes.name: Fallen Dominion
heroes.bio: Front line damage dealer, who possesses strong potential.

heroes.name: Lunar Guardian
heroes.bio: Middle physical damage dealer, representative of the moon, attacks multiple targets with her sharp weapon.
